name: Riki Iwasaki
title: Injeniyeri wa porogaramu
summary: Umuhinga mu bijanye n’ugutegura porogarama, arondera akaryo gashasha ko gukorera imigambi minini. Gushimishwa no kurema canke kwongerako kode kugira abandi bayikoreshe. Nizera ko ubuhinga bwanje ari buto ugereranije na internet, rero ndakunda cane gukorana n’ibindi bikoresho, ibikorwa, indimi zo gukora porogarama.

education.location: Fullerton, muri Kaliforuniya, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Irvine, muri Kaliforuniya, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.

experience.title: Injeniyeri wa porogaramu
experience.location: Irvine, muri Kaliforuniya, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
responsibilities: Ubwubatsi n'ugushirwa mu ngiro kw'ibikorwa vy'urubuga bishobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe React na Node.js
Yakoranye n'abarongozi b'ibicuruzwa kugira ngo batunganye ibisabwa no kumenya ko bishikirizwa ku gihe
Yateguye kandi ibungabunga RESTful APIs ku bikorwa vy'urubuga
Yateguye inyandiko zo gukora ibikorwa vy'ubuhinga no kwongereza ubushobozi

experience.title: Umumenyereza w'umupira w'amaguru
experience.location: Irvine, muri Kaliforuniya, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
responsibilities: Kwigisha ubuhinga bwo gukina tennis mu mugwi w'abakinyi 5-10
Gutuma icigwa kiryoha kandi kigashimisha abakinyi
Ujejwe umutekano w’abakinyi bari ku kibuga, cane cane abakinyi bato n’abakuze, nk’abafise imyaka 3 n’abafise imyaka 60

experience.title: Umufatanyabikorwa wo hanze

Gufasha abakiriya kuronka ibintu mu iduka
Gutuma ububiko buguma busukuye kandi butunganijwe
Kubungabunga ahantu heza kandi h'ubugenzi ku bakiriya n'abakozi
